Contributor.Organization: Vaccine Research Institute of San Diego

Platform.Title: STv6_MMCC
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: purified PCR products amplified from Salmonella genomes spotted in 50% DMSO
Platform.Description: purified PCR products amplified from Salmonella genomes spotted in 50% DMSO

Sample.Title: RRE2 14028s(delpreA)pBAD18 14028s(wt)pBAD18preA LB10mMAra OD0.74_6D071_1

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium
Channel.Characteristics: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium 14028s
Salmonella typhimurium 14028s-preA mutant complemented with pBAD18 (vector control) grown in LB+10mM Ara at OD0.74
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: incorporation of Cy3-dCTP with SuperscriptII and random hexamers

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium
Channel.Characteristics: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium 14028s
Salmonella typhimurium 14028s complemented with pBAD18+preA grown in LB+10mM Ara at OD0.74
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: incorporation of Cy5-dCTP with SuperscriptII and random hexamers

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: overnight hyb on Corning UltraGAPS slides at 42Â°C in 25% formamide / 5xSSC / 0.1% BSA
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Perkin Elmer ScanArray 5000 scanner, image acquisition with ScanArray Express 3.0.1 software, spot quantification using Quantarray 3.0 software, adaptive quantification, protocol STv6_01_050607
Sample.Data-Processing: normalized based on total signal for each channel, background subtracted VALUE data obtained from log of normalized background subtracted ch1/ch2 signal.

Column.Name: CH1_SIGNAL_NOISE_RATIO_FILTER
Column.Description: Channel 1 signal to noise ratio filter

Column.Name: CH2_SIGNAL_NOISE_RATIO_FILTER
Column.Description: Channel 2 signal to noise ratio filter

Column.Name: PRE-VALUE
Column.Description: ch1 % of total / ch2 % of total

Column.Name: INV_VALUE
Column.Description: log of ch1 % of total / ch2 % of total

Series.Title: PreA overexpression in Salmonella typhimurium
Series.Summary: Comparisons of overexpression of PreA (in wt or preAB mutant Salmonella) to Salmonella lacking preA or preAB in late log phase growth in LB
Series.Overall-Design: preA was externally supplied to wt or preAB mutant Salmonella typhimurium on a pBAD18 plasmid, which was then induced by 10mM arabinose and grown to late log phase (OD0.74). Transcription profiles were compared with those obtained from preA or preAB mutant Salmonella harboring pBAD18 only as vector control.
